bibdata.title: American National Standard Dictionary of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) including Electromagnetic Environmental Effects (E3)
Redline
American National Standard Dictionary of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) including Electromagnetic Environmental Effects (E3) - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: ANSI C63.14-2014 (Revision of ANSI C63.14-2009) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terms associated with electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) and electromagnetic environmental effects (E3) are defined including electromagnetic pulse (EMP) and electrostatic discharge (ESD) terms. Quantities, units, multiplying factors, symbols, and abbreviations are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
